languages.text: Забавы ради гемункул запер душу провидицы в некое подобие игральной доски — каждый ход, каждое прикосновение к ней — сплошное страдание.

traits.locale_text: Забавы ради гемункул запер душу провидицы в некое подобие игральной доски — каждый ход, каждое прикосновение к ней — сплошное страдание.

languages.text: For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.
languages.original_text: Забавы ради гемункул запер душу провидицы в некое подобие игральной доски — каждый ход, каждое прикосновение к ней — сплошное страдание.

traits.locale_text: For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of the seer in some kind of playing board — every move, every touch to it is sheer suffering.
For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.
For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.

languages.text: Pour son propre plaisir morbide, l'hémoncule a enfermé l'âme d'une Grande Prophète dans une sorte de plateau de jeu. Chaque déplacement, chaque contact, inflige une souffrance indicible à la victime.
languages.original_text: For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.

traits.locale_text: Pour son propre plaisir morbide, l'hémoncule a enfermé l'âme d'une Grande Prophète dans une sorte de plateau de jeu. Chaque déplacement, chaque contact, inflige une souffrance indicible à la victime.

languages.text: 出于某种病态的乐趣，血伶人将某个先知的灵魂囚禁在了棋盘里。每个动作、每次接触，都会为受害者带来无法忍受的纯粹痛苦。
languages.original_text: For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.

traits.locale_text: 出于某种病态的乐趣，血伶人将某个先知的灵魂囚禁在了棋盘里。每个动作、每次接触，都会为受害者带来无法忍受的纯粹痛苦。

languages.text: 陰鬱な遊びを楽しもうと、ハモンキュラスは先見司の魂を、遊戯盤のようなものの中に閉じ込めてしまった。動くたび、触れるたび、それは犠牲者の苦しみとなる。
languages.original_text: For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.

traits.locale_text: 陰鬱な遊びを楽しもうと、ハモンキュラスは先見司の魂を、遊戯盤のようなものの中に閉じ込めてしまった。動くたび、触れるたび、それは犠牲者の苦しみとなる。

languages.text: Der Haemonculus hat die Seele eines Runenpropheten zu seiner Belustigung in einer Art Spielbrett eingesperrt. Jeder Zug, jede Berührung bedeutet für das Opfer schreckliches Leid.
languages.original_text: For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.

traits.locale_text: Der Haemonculus hat die Seele eines Runenpropheten zu seiner Belustigung in einer Art Spielbrett eingesperrt. Jeder Zug, jede Berührung bedeutet für das Opfer schreckliches Leid.

languages.text: El Hemónculo ha sellado el alma de un vidente en una especie de tablero de juego por macabra diversión. Cada movimiento y cada toque infligen un sufrimiento inefable a su víctima.
languages.original_text: For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.

traits.locale_text: El Hemónculo ha sellado el alma de un vidente en una especie de tablero de juego por macabra diversión. Cada movimiento y cada toque infligen un sufrimiento inefable a su víctima.

languages.text: Haimonkulus, hastalıklı eğlence anlayışıyla Ötesezen'in ruhunu bir çeşit oyun tahtasına kilitledi. Her hareket ve dokunuş, kurbana saf bir acı veriyor.
languages.original_text: For morbid fun, the Haemonculus locked the soul of a Farseer in some kind of game board — every move, every touch means pure suffering for its victim.
